mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO,COUNTRY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE,WRITE_DATE ,READ_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B JOIN COUNTRY USING (COUNTRY_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
